name: Unreal Platformer
description:
Unreal Platformer is a very short platformer game. This is my first game, and this game powered by Unreal Engine 5.1 and coded entirely in C++.

Key features:
  • Enemies
  • Checkpoints
  • Coins
Controls:
  • WASD to move
  • Mouse to look around
  • Space to jump
